name: Tackle
description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

name: Quick Attack
description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

name: Take Down
description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

name: Razor Leaf
description: Sharp edged leaves are launched to slash at the opponent.

name: Vine Whip
description: A whip-like vine is used to lash the opponent. It may also lower the target's Defense stat.

name: Ember
description: The target is attacked with small flames.

name: Flamethrower
description: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire.

name: Water Gun
description: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

name: Thunder Shock
description: A jolt of electricity is hurled at the target to inflict damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Psybeam
description: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. It may also cause confusion.

name: Ice Beam
description: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. It may also freeze the target solid.

name: Earthquake
description: The monster sets off an earthquake that strikes every Pmon around it.

name: Shadow Ball
description: The monster hurls a shadowy blob at the target. It may also lower the target's Def stat.

name: Hydro Pump
description: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

name: Electric Surge
description: The monster releases a powerful electric surge that damages the target and lowers its speed.

name: Toxic Spray
description: The monster sprays a toxic substance on the target, which gradually poisons it.

name: Shadow Sneak
description: The monster sneaks up on the target from behind and strikes it with a shadowy force.

name: Aqua Tail
description: The monster attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.

name: Frost Breath
description: The monster exhales a freezing-cold breath that may freeze the target.
